name: Real Estate Agent Site Template
description: Complete Swedish real estate agent website template with property listings, valuations, and sales statistics, built using SEVDO frontend compiler
author: SEVDO Team

backend.description: FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL database for property and client management

pages.Hem.s: Homepage with hero section, sales statistics, featured properties, and market insights
pages.TillSalu.s: Property listings with search filters, detailed property cards, and interactive map
pages.Vardering.s: Property valuation request form with market analysis and consultation booking
pages.OmOss.s: About us page with agent profiles, company history, and market expertise
pages.Kontakt.s: Contact information, office locations, and inquiry forms

features: Interactive property listings with image galleries
Market statistics and sales data visualization

installation.backend: Copy auth.py and real_estate_models.py, configure database and property APIs
installation.frontend: Compile .s files using SEVDO frontend compiler
installation.customization: Edit template.json values and agency-specific details
